Psilophrys ghilarovi sp. nov. is described and illustrated. The characteristics of this species, which
differentiate it from a related species, P. parvulus, are given. The host of P. ghilarovi was Kermes
palestiniensis on Quercus coccifera in the Mediterranean region of Turkey.
